name: Free Eye Checkup Camp
description: A comprehensive eye checkup camp offering free eye examinations and consultations, ensuring eye health and early detection of issues.

name: Pediatric Health Camp
description: A health camp focused on the well-being of children, providing vaccinations, health checkups, and health education for a brighter future.

name: Dental Care Camp
description: Offering free dental checkups and treatments for the community, ensuring better oral health and awareness about dental hygiene.

name: Cardiology Camp
description: Providing heart health screenings and consultations with experienced cardiologists, promoting cardiovascular health and preventive care.

name: General Health Camp
description: A comprehensive health camp offering general health checkups and consultations for all age groups, aiming to improve overall community health.

name: Orthopedic Camp
description: Specialized camp for bone and joint health, providing consultations and treatments by expert orthopedists to enhance mobility and strength.
